title: Oscilloscope Screenshot with Low-Frequency Sine and Ripple
summary: Rigol oscilloscope screenshot with yellow and cyan traces, where the cyan trace is higher frequency ripple and the yellow trace is lower-frequency waveform. Measurements show CH1 near 1.00 Hz and CH2 near 4.17 Hz.

structured_data.description: Rigol interface in RUN mode. Timebase shows 500 ms/div. Bottom readout shows both channels at 2.50 V/div. Frequency measurements displayed are approximately CH1 1.00 Hz and CH2 4.17 Hz.
